question: Consider the following statements about International Whaling Commission (IWC) 1.It was established in 1946, making it one of the first pieces of international environmental legislation. 2.India is not the member of IWC. 3.Japan has announced its decision to withdraw from the International Whaling Commission (IWC). Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: The International Whaling Commission is an Inter-governmental Organisation whose purpose is the conservation of whales and the management of whaling. The IWC has a current membership of 89 Governments from countries all over the world. India joined the commission in 1981.The withdrawal would enable Japan to resume commercial whaling activities.
